reviewText: great show why are they not releasing the rest ofnthe seasons? been waiting along time for season 3 and up come on pit a move on it even the new shows are already out but nope not third watch and it was the best show on tv besides ER hurry please release all the rest of the seasons.

People, if you want to buy "Third Watch" Seasons 1 and 2, add them to your cart individually. Why pay $96 on this listing when right now each title separately is $24? That's $48 for the both of em!

Third Watch is one of a few  law & order TV shows I watched on a regular basis I liked the fact it portrayed ALL aspects of law enforcement & not just the police. I really liked the way the 9/11 Attacks on the WTC were handled. The recurring cast is nothing but SUPERB! I just wish the last 3 seasons will come out on DVD real soon!
